clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Exposure to Informative Video Before Cesarean Delivery on Maternal Anxiety
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Exposure to Informative Video Before Cesarean Delivery on Maternal Anxiety and Peripartum Satisfaction- a Randomized Control Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
The incidence of cesarean deliveries (CD) worldwide is increasing, around 30% in United States. Although very common surgery women undergoing non emergent CD still experience fear and anxiety. It is known that increased levels of stress can negatively affect pain perception and the usage of analgesics postoperatively as well as lactation.
this present study investigate the effect of exposure to informative video before cesarean delivery on maternal anxiety.

detailed_description.textblock: A multi-center randomized control trial the will examine the effect of exposure to informative video before cesarean delivery on maternal anxiety and satisfaction

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (Questionnaire filled by the patient Before operation)
primary_outcome.description: Psychological questionnaire to assess stress and anxiety-The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) is a psychological inventory based on a 4-point Likert scale and consists of 20 questions on a self-report basis. Higher scores are positively correlated with higher levels of anxiety.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire filled by the patient at admission- 1 day before operation
secondary_outcome.description: Psychological questionnaire to assess stress and anxietyhe State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) is a psychological inventory based on a 4-point Likert scale and consists of 20 questions on a self-report basis. Higher scores are positively correlated with higher levels of anxiety.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionnaire filled by the patient at 1 day after the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to evaluate the women experience and satisfaction

arm_group.description: The study group will be exposed to a video at admission to an elective cesarean delivery. The video will have information regarding the admission, pre-operation preparation and post- operation recovery. All patients will answer a questionnaire at admission, before surgery and 24 hours later. the questionnaires will evaluate the impact of exposure to informative video before caesarean delivery on anxiety and stress measured by State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI).

All patients will answer a questionnaire at admission, before surgery and 24 hours later. the questionnaires will evaluate anxiety and stress measured by State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) without intervention.

intervention.description: Exposure to informative video before cesarean delivery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hebrew speaking
- Informed consent
- First cesarean delivery
- Non emergent elective CD
Exclusion Criteria:
- Non Hebrew speaking
- Refuse to participate
- Emergency CD
